text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I have plans with Maruzensky to look<n>at cleats together, but
she's a little<n>late...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After failing to reach her by phone, I<n>decide to head to her
place.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Uh, coming! Goodness, another<n>package?! Sorry! Just a<n>
min—hyaaah?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I hear a loud noise followed by a<n>shout, so I instinctively
open the door...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Inside, I see Maruzensky buried<n>under a pile of boxes.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Sorry for startling you like that.
choice_data_list: What was up with all the boxes?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I love shopping online, and they send<n>each thing in a
separate cardboard<n>box, you know? I didn't even realize<n>
they'd piled up so high.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: So...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Ugh! I haven't cleaned up at all! My<n>whole room's a mess
of boxes!
choice_data_list: I take it you don't clean often?
I take it you don't clean often?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well... I wouldn't say that.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I always tidy up pretty well whenguests come over. I even get all thenooks and crannies.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But when no one visits, I can't seem<n>to find the energy...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I dropped my phone in between the<n>boxes this morning.
Then you got<n>there while I was still trying to look for<n>it.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I dropped my phone in between the<n>boxes this morning.
Then you got<n>there while I was still trying to look for<n>it.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm super late, and youwitnessed the mess I'm living in.Sigh... I really should try to cleanmore often.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wha?! You'll help? You sure?
choice_data_list: You'll find the energy if it's the two of us, right?
You'll find the energy if it's the two of us, right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah, with you there, I'll be all that<n>and a bag of chips!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah, with you there, I'll be all that<n>and a bag of chips!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Thanks! ♪ I appreciate it, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Thanks! ♪ I appreciate it, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We head back to her place and spend<n>the next few hours
cleaning up the<n>tremendous number of cardboard<n>boxes.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Trainer! My room looks<n>so much better!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Trainer! My room looks<n>so much better!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Dinner's on me. Pick anything you<n>want—don't be shy. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I'll even make something from<n>scratch if you want. I may
not seem it,<n>but I'm a great cook!
choice_data_list: Oh, do you cook a lot?
Oh, do you cook a lot?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Um, about as much as I clean. I just<n>can't be bothered
when it's just me.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
But today is different. You're here, so<n>I'm super motivated!
Japanese,<n>French, Chinese, whatever you want.<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
But today is different. You're here, so<n>I'm super motivated!
Japanese,<n>French, Chinese, whatever you want.<n>♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm going all out, so I hope you<n>brought an appetite!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After shopping for the ingredients,<n>Maruzensky prepares a
wonderful<n>dinner. She expertly prepares and<n>dishes out
plate after plate.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It looks great and tastes even better.<n>Even a professional
chef would be<n>impressed!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Phew! That was nice. Did you like it,<n>Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Phew! That was nice. Did you like it,<n>Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I'm glad. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to make up for the<n>disappointing day this turned
out to be.<n>I hope it wasn't too much trouble.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to make up for the<n>disappointing day this turned
out to be.<n>I hope it wasn't too much trouble.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
And it looks like I succeeded, so<n>that's a relief! Now there's
just...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Making sure I don't let those boxes<n>pile up again.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Though that's easier said than<n>done—it really is a pain.
Cleaning is<n>such a hassle.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I don't hate it or anything, but it's not<n>the same as running
or dancing—I<n>can't get into it on my own.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
...Ah! How about you stop by every<n>now and then to check
up on me?<n>Isn't that a good idea?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
...Ah! How about you stop by every<n>now and then to check
up on me?<n>Isn't that a good idea?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Really? How can I thank you? ...Right,<n>how about more home
cooking? ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Since you'll be coming over to enjoy<n>my food...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Since you'll be coming over to enjoy<n>my food...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I'll be motivated to keep my room<n>tidy, and we can enjoy
eating<n>together!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh, this is the best. Themotivation, sure, but food will taste somuch better now that I'm not eatingalone!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: My worries are solved, and Ihave something to look forward to!Thank you, Trainer. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: My worries are solved, and Ihave something to look forward to!Thank you, Trainer. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: All right, I'll be heading home now.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You know, cleaning up and eating<n>together...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
These are incredibly simple things,<n>but I'm looking forward
to them so<n>much, I can barely stand it!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Haha, I shouldn't be this happy<n>needing you to check up on
the state<n>of my room.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
...Ah, that's it! Maybe you should<n>move in next door. Then
you won't<n>have to commute all the way to my<n>place.
Right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I think the room next door is empty.<n>I'll look into it!
choice_data_list: Uh, I think that might be a bit much!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Aw, that's too bad. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you're so cute when you get<n>all flustered!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you're so cute when you get<n>all flustered!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well, jokes aside... I'd be happy to<n>have you over anytime.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Even if it's every day. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As she gets in her car and drives off,<n>I can tell from her
smirk that she was<n>teasing me.
